attributes.action: Parole Boards held accountable for any re offending within 10 years.
attributes.additional_details:
Too many Parole releases end up with serious Re Offending.
The Public want them to be held individually accountable
attributes.background:
As in most professions, when you make bad decisions, you are personally held accountable.
Parole Boards need to be held accountable similarly by 'Individual) Financial penalties.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Disciplinary procedures are a matter for individual employers. 

We could accept a petition calling for the Parole Board as an institution to be fined for reoffending, if that's something you'd like to see happen.
